Classes

class  FdoXmlSaxHandler
 FdoXmlSaxHandler defines the FDO SAX Handler callback interface. It is not an interface in the strict sense, since each function has a default implementation that does nothing. Implementors can override these callbacks to customize the handling of XML fragments parsed by FdoXmlReader. More...
